page.title: 06Industry in Thorney, Part 2
page.content: The{Bridge Engineering Company}has been going for{10 years.}Six people work there, 5 from{Thorney}and 1 from {Eye.}The following machines are used by the firm in its work: {Welders, mills, lathes, press brake, {cropper, guillotine, forge, drill (1 {radial).}Most of the people there work from{8.30 am}to{5.30 pm.}The biggest articles they make are{tanks}for {forklifts}and{scoops}and{buckets}for {J.C.B's.}Most of their work involves manufacturing specific products for companies all over the{country.}They have even worked as far afield as {Nigeria.}They have got{2 offices, 1 {workshop, 1 firm's van, 1 snack room, {2 forklifts}and{1 firm's lorry.}Part of the premises is used as{stables}for a local farmer's{shire horses.
